Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery/jquery.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery/jquery.gadgets.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function($) {

  var baseUrl = 'http://developmentor.lrlab.to/opensocial-jquery';

  /**
   * success
   */

  var url = baseUrl + '/json.cgi';

  $.ajax({
    url: url, type: 'POST',
  
    data: { foo: 'bar' },
    dataType: 'json',
    dataFilter: function(data, type) {
      console.log('dataFilter', data, type);
      return '{ data: ' + data + ' }';
    },

    processData: true,
  
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
  });

  $.ajax({
    url: url, type: 'POST',
  
    data: { foo: 'bar' },
    dataType: 'json',
    dataFilter: function(data, type) {
      console.log('dataFilter', data, type);
      return '{ data: ' + data + ' }';
    },

    processData: false, // s.data.match is not a function
  
    success: function(data, status) {
      console.log('success', data, status);
    },
  });

});
//gadgets.ut
</script>
